summary.name: Summary
summary.content:
Innovative and results-driven engineer, a true Swiss knife – versatile from technical expertise to digitalization, and from hands-on implementation to project leadership.

Passionate about smart, value-added solutions that drive efficiency, align with business goals, and deliver impactful change.

items.institution: HEIG-VD Bachelor of Applied Science (B.A.Sc.) in Engineering and Management

items.summary:
Leading the Innovation 4 Manufacturing program to drive technology adoption, improve product quality, reduce waste, and digitalize manufacturing processes.

In a regional role covering 13 European sites, I identify business needs, create business cases, and ensure project execution.

My role is to identify and implement scalable technical solutions across sites, combining engineering expertise with business strategy.

I work closely with leadership and suppliers to deliver impactful and practical innovations.

Key Achievements:

  • Implemented an output tracker to improve process visibility and efficiency at a local manufacturing site.

  • Deployed a vision system with edge learning in Grenoble to accurately detect needles and boost precision.

  • Rolled out five AI-enabled vision systems in Switzerland and Singapore, reducing defects and inspection waste.

  • Improved cycle time by 60% and reduced costs through a new standardized traceability system.

  • Promoted a culture of innovation, enhancing collaboration and influencing technology choices in new product development.

• Lead project for the PMO: Planification (MS Project, JIRA), Manage team and execution to achieved goal.

  • Characterization and validation for production of Backfill and Seamweld process.

Responsible for laser welding, gas filling and engraving process on the micro device production line

  • Managed CAPA, non-conformities, and complaints to ensure compliance and continuous improvement.

  • Production performance by monitoring key processes and executing continuous improvement projects.

Establishing a strategic plan for new ISO 17025 calibration laboratory in Europe, assessing regional needs and identifying the most suitable location based on business relevance and technical feasibility.
• Organize annual ski weekends for 250+ people in a social club.
